item.title: Fred V add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Sometimes you wake up. Sometimes the fall kills you. And sometimes, when you fall, you fly." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Fred V add a quote by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
item.description: "Man is, that he may have Joy." -- The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "A warrior may change his metal, but not his heart." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "No fiction is worth reading except for entertainment. If it entertains and is clean, it is good literature, or its kind. If it forms the habit of reading, in people who might not read otherwise, it is the best literature." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "In one respect at least the Martians are a happy people, they have no lawyers." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "Yes, I was a fool, but I was in love, and though I was suffering the greatest misery I had ever known I would not have had it otherwise for all the riches of Barsoom. Such is love, and such are lovers wherever love is known." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "It is a characteristic of the weak and criminal to attribute to others the misfortunes that are the result of their own wickedness." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "I shall have to believe even though I cannot understand." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "I am Tarzan of the Apes. I want you. I am yours. You are mine. We live here together always in my house. I will bring you the best of fruits, the tenderest deer, the finest meats that roam the jungle. I will hunt for you. I am the greatest of the jungle fighters. I will fight for you. I am the mightiest of the jungle fighters. You are Jane Porter, I saw it in your letter. When you see this you will know that it is for you and that Tarzan of the Apes loves you." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs

item.title: Fred V add a quote by edgar rice burroughs
Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "Beast?" Jane murmured. "Then God make me a beast; for, man or beast, I am yours." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs LOST ON VENUS 1932
item.description: "Golf is a mental disorder." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs LOST ON VENUS 1932

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "We are between the wild thoat of certainty and the mad zitidar of fact." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs

item.title: Fred V add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "I understand that you belittle all sentiments of generosity and kindness, but I do not, and I can convince your most doughty warrior that these characteristics are not incompatible with an ability to fight." -- Edgar Rice Burroughs
